snippet.title: The Beacon's End - Indie Horror Game - No Commentary
snippet.description:
Thanks For Watching!

Facebook https://www.facebook.com/Stella-Abbasi-100150965166877/
Twitter https://twitter.com/StellaAbbasi

Download https://capcrowgames.itch.io/the-beacons-end

You play as Samuel, a solitary lighthouse keeper on the remote Blackstone island. Tasked with a daily routine trying to forget his haunting past by maintaining the lighthouse beacon to protect passing ships, Samuel is unaware that underneath the island lurks something very sinister.

Indie Horror Game Playlist https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLk0tZ0YT3FZEsIgd3Qdj19xGe9VcMMI1P

#thebeaconsend #Indiegames
